products.title: Genesis White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This white perfect fit roller blind is ideal to add a fresh feel to any room in your home and will also go with existing decor due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws. Product id: sdb-pfr0175 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis white perfect fit roller blind in white.
